column4: hey, im trying to add a new bootable partition to grub, is there a command to display the hd(x,y) stuff for drives/partitions
when you are booting in grub, hit c and then you can get to the grub command line and use tab completion to figure out what you want
okay ill give that a go
well you can run grub from the command line
but sometimes it doesnt retunr the same results
